eventDecorators.name: InvestorAdded
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: InvestorRemoved
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: IssuerAdded
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: IssuerRemoved
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: OperatorsContractChanged
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: OperatorsContractPending
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

functionDecorators.name: addInvestor
functionDecorators.description: Operator or relay can give '_account' address investor privileges if the contract is not paused.

parameterDecorators.name: _account
parameterDecorators.description: address that should be given investor privileges.

functionDecorators.name: addIssuer
functionDecorators.description: Operator/Admin can give '_account' address issuer privileges if the contract is not paused.

parameterDecorators.name: _account
parameterDecorators.description: address that should be given issuer privileges.

functionDecorators.name: confirmFor
functionDecorators.description: Confirms RaiseOperator contract address once acive.

functionDecorators.name: confirmOperatorsContract
functionDecorators.description: The function should be called from new operators contract by admin to ensure that operatorsPending address is the real contract address.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Initialization instead of constructor, called once. The setOperatorsContract function can be called only by Admin role with confirmation through the operators contract.

functionDecorators.name: removeInvestor
functionDecorators.description: Operator or relay can revoke '_account' address investor privileges if the contract is not paused.

parameterDecorators.name: _account
parameterDecorators.description: address that should be revoked investor privileges.

functionDecorators.name: removeIssuer
functionDecorators.description: Operator/Admin can revoke '_account' address issuer privileges if the contract is not paused.

parameterDecorators.name: _account
parameterDecorators.description: address that should be revoked issuer privileges.

functionDecorators.name: setOperatorsContract
functionDecorators.description: Set the new the address of Operators contract, should be confirmed from operators contract by calling confirmFor(addr) where addr is the address of current contract instance. This is done to prevent the case when the new contract address is broken and control of the contract can be lost in such case.
